title: Microsoft Corp (MSFT) is down 0.32% Friday In Premarket Trading
text:
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) is down -0.32%% today.



 MSFT has an Overall Score of 73. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on MSFT!
See Full MSFT Report





MSFT stock closed at $404.87 and is down -$1.28 during pre-market trading. Pre-market tends to be more volatile due to significantly lower volume as most investors only trade between standard trading hours.

MSFT has a strong overall score of 73 meaning the stock holds a better value than 73% of stocks at its current price. InvestorsObserver's overall ranking system is a comprehensive evaluation and considers both technical and fundamental factors when evaluating a stock. The overall score is a great starting point for investors that are beginning to evaluate a stock.

MSFT gets a average Short-Term Technical score of 60 from InvestorsObserver's proprietary ranking system. This means that the stock's trading pattern over the last month have been neutral. Microsoft Corp currently has the 70th highest Short-Term Technical score in the Software - Infrastructure industry. The Short-Term Technical score evaluates a stock's trading pattern over the past month and is most useful to short-term stock and option traders. 




Microsoft Corp's Overall and Short-Term Technical score paint a mixed picture for MSFT's recent trading patterns and forecasted price.
